Sharpclaws/depfear/Charon/Underground/Aelo/Celeno/Ocipite::

Hecate divided and Aelo, Celeno and Ocipite appeared again. 
Perceptor's squad was ready to fight just incase. The three Ladies 
walked in front of the males and stopped inf front of Scorponok and 
said:

Aelo/Celeno/Ocipite: we're Darkfate's warriors... Our master is a 
Predacon undercover commander...

Aelo: Are you Scorponok, Beast Wars's Predacon Warrior, we presume?
Celeno: We heard that you had died in Beast Wars..
Ocipite: How did you save yourself?

 


> >The males saw each other and they didn't move. Watting bot's 
reaction.
> >
> Strange Scorpion: "Meg, Megatron a traitor, you lie, he would never 
betray
> the Predacon beliefs" he starts to clank his claws 
furiously "Megatron
> great leader, always treated Scorponok with respect" he says again 
to no
> one in perticular as he starts spining. Then he turns and realizes 
that he
> is still being watched and starts to remember the fear of all those 
weapons
> being drawn on him, clanking again he speaks.
> 
> Strange Scorpion: "Scorponok Terrorize" and with this the scorpion 
changes
> to a robotic figuer with two pincher claws for hand and a tail 
errupting
> out of the back, on his shoulders and calfs are wheels which he 
seems to
> stare at in disbelief, then calms himself and stratens his posture 
and puts
> a claw up to his head as if to salute.
> 
> Scorponok: "I am Skorponok, Preadacon second in command to 
Megatron, Thank
> you for freeing me, but, what has happend to me, and who are you?" 
He says
> as he points his claw almost accusingly.
> 
> 
> OOC: Im assuming OOC means out of character right? Tell me if I'm 
making my
> posts to long as I want no hard feelings.
